precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
action: Click the 'Start' button located in the lower left corner of the screen.
expected_results: The Start menu will open, displaying a list of options.

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open and the 'Control Panel' option is visible.
action: Click on the 'Control Panel' option in the Start Menu.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will open, displaying various system category icons.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and in Category view.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" window will open.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" window of the Windows XP Control Panel is open. The "Display" icon is visible in the "or pick a Control Panel icon" section.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will open, overlaying the "Appearance and Themes" window.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Themes" tab active.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab will become active, displaying screen saver options.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the down arrow of the 'Screen Saver' drop-down list.
expected_results: A list of available screen saver options will appear.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click on "3D FlowerBox" in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Settings" and "Preview" buttons will become active.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'Power' button is visible within the 'Monitor power' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open, overlaying the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "System hibernates" setting is visible.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to the "System hibernates" setting.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of time interval options will appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click "Never" in the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" dropdown menu will close, and "Never" will be displayed, indicating the system will not automatically hibernate.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
action: Hover the mouse pointer over the "Save As..." button.
expected_results: No visible changes will occur in the user interface.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power schemes" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the "Always On" option in the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will update to reflect the settings of the "Always On" power scheme.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click on the dropdown arrow next to "Turn off hard disks".
expected_results: A dropdown menu with time options will appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to  "Turn off monitor".
expected_results: A list of time options will appear in a dropdown menu.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "System hibernates:" dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "System hibernates:" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates:" dropdown menu will close. The "Power Options Properties" window will reflect the selected "Never" option for "System hibernates".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Cancel" button is visible.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close. The "Display Properties" window will remain open.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open with the 'Screen Saver' tab selected.
The "Appearance and Themes" window is open.
action: Click the "Close" button in the title bar of the "Appearance and Themes" window.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" window will close.
